Hospital.Controllers

Class TreatmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.TreatmentController

  • @SystemAPI
public class TreatmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller enables the following usecases: Order Treatment: returns a list of all untreated diagnoses of the current patient. returns an ItemArgument to select the items from. makes the right treatment.

    • Method Detail

      • getUntreatedDiagnoses

        @SystemAPI
public DiagnosisInfo[] getUntreatedDiagnoses()
                                      throws NotLoggedInException,
                                             NoOpenedPatientFileException
        Gets a list of untreated diagnoses for the currently opened patient
        Returns:
        an array of DiagnosisInfos representing untreated diagnoses
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
        NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor has no patientfile opened

      • makeSurgery

        public java.lang.String makeSurgery(DiagnosisInfo diagnosis,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           Priority p)
                             throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                                    NotLoggedInException,
                                    InvalidDiagnosisException,
                                    InvalidArgumentException
        makes a new surgery treatment.
        Parameters:
        diagnosis - The diagnosis to add the treatment to.
        description - The description of the surgery
        p - The priority to schedule this treatment with
        Returns:
        a description of the created surgery, with the time of the appointment if it could be scheduled
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException - : if no patientfile was opened
        NotLoggedInException - : if the doctor logged out or something
        InvalidDiagnosisException - : if the diagnosis was not found in the current patient's file
        InvalidArgumentException - : if some parameter was null.

      • makeCast

        public java.lang.String makeCast(DiagnosisInfo diagnosis,
                        java.lang.String description,
                        int duration,
                        Priority p)
                          throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                                 NotLoggedInException,
                                 InvalidDiagnosisException,
                                 InvalidArgumentException
        make a new cast-treatment
        Parameters:
        diagnosis - the diagnosis to add the treatment to
        description - the description of the treatment
        duration - the length the cast must stay on
        p - the priority to schedule the treatment with
        Returns:
        a description of the generated treatment optionally with the appointment
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException - : if no patientfile was opened
        NotLoggedInException - : if the doctor logged out or something
        InvalidDiagnosisException - : if the diagnosis was not found in the current patient's file
        InvalidArgumentException - : if some parameter was null.

      • makeMedication

        public java.lang.String makeMedication(DiagnosisInfo diagnosis,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              boolean sensitivity,
                              java.lang.String items,
                              Priority p)
                                throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                                       NotLoggedInException,
                                       InvalidDiagnosisException,
                                       InvalidArgumentException
        make a new MedicationTreatment
        Parameters:
        diagnosis - the diagnosis to add the treatment to
        description - the description of the treatment
        sensitivity - if the patient is sensitive to medication
        items - the medicine to give to the patient as treatment
        p - the priority to schedule the treatment with
        Returns:
        a description of the generated treatment, optionally with a appointmentdescription
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException - : if no patientfile was opened
        NotLoggedInException - : if the doctor logged out or something
        InvalidDiagnosisException - : if the diagnosis was not found in the current patient's file
        InvalidArgumentException - : if some parameter was null.

      • getItemArgument

        public ItemArgument getItemArgument()
        returns a ItemsArgument filled with the items this hospital has
        Returns:
        a new ItemArgument to select items from.
